nodes.bodyText:
I believe each individual permission like 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/create' ( pattern:  'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/*' )  is no longer defined.
Otherwise one can still create its own custom role with these permission to use this feature.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -69,27 +69,3 @@ reports_instances_read_access:
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to read and download Reports and Report-definitions

nodes.bodyText: https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security-kibana-plugin/pull/657 is removing the option to create from user.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -69,27 +69,3 @@ reports_instances_read_access:
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to read and download Reports and Report-definitions

nodes.bodyText: These "cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/* " and "cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/* " are still present in https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security-kibana-plugin/pull/657 ..
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -69,27 +69,3 @@ reports_instances_read_access:
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
     - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to read and download Reports and Report-definitions
-reports_read_access:
-  reserved: true
-  cluster_permissions:
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'
-
-# Allows users to all Reports functionality
-reports_full_access:
-  reserved: true
-  cluster_permissions:
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/create'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/update'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/on_demand'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/delete'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/get'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/definition/list'
-    - 'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'

nodes.bodyText:
'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/list'
'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/instance/get'
'cluster:admin/opendistro/reports/menu/download'

above 3 are required for reports_instances_read_access role and its customization (which is part of release)
